meanings.definition: A person or thing that is between two extremes or categories.
meanings.sent1: The tweener in the group couldn't decide if he preferred sweet or salty snacks.
meanings.sent2: She was a tweener when it came to fashion, not fully embracing either casual or formal styles.
meanings.sent3: The tweener at the party couldn't choose between dancing or chatting with friends.
meanings.sent4: Being a tweener in the debate, he struggled to pick a side on the controversial topic.
meanings.sent5: The character in the story was a tweener, torn between loyalty to family and following his dreams.

meanings.sent1: The coach decided to put him in as a tweener to add versatility to the team's lineup.
